name: Crystal Chameleon
description:
Sci-Fi Cyberpunk Visual Novel based in a future where telepathic powers are common-place. Meet Jackie - a freelance negotiator who's best friend is a cyber dolphin. Accompany her in an adventure she didn't really ask for. Solve a mystery and maybe make some new friends along the way.

Crystal Chameleon is a choice based visual novel. Make decisions at various places in the game to proceed in a good or bad timeline.

Good luck making the right choices ;)

Vysoko Anime Production
* Story and production by Milan Kazarka
* Development by Jeroen van Oosten
* Art and design by Emanuele Arnaldi
* Editing by Daniel Meyer
* Music by Sebastian Bach
* Music by Felix Barbarino
* Music by Mim Rasouli
